Authors: Zhi Peng Dou, Ying Zhang, Wei He
Title: A new species of lasiodiplodia in China
Abstract:
A new species of Lasiodiplodia (L. hyalina) is described
and illustrated from two hosts collected from Guangdong and Hainan
Province in China. Only asexual states of L. hyalina were observed,
which is characterized by most of conidia remain hyaline after
discharged three months. Phylogenetically, L. hyalina is closely related
to L. thailandica and L. iraniensis. Morphological comparisons of these
three species lead to the conclusion that the collected taxon is new to
science.
